1: <pb/><t>¡Qo'qe'ye' e'tmajen Qman Dyos!</t> <t>¡Kyajwali'nktze' Qman Dyos kykyaqile',</t> <t>inche tene' toju' tja te qonik'an!</t>
2: <t>¡Kyiq'i'nktze' kyq'ob'e' tu'me'lju' ja xjan</t> <t>ex kyajwali'nktze' Qman Dyos!</t>
3: <t>¡Awtju' Qman Dyos b'inchante kya'j ex tx'otx',</t> <t>tzaj ky'iwlanteya tzmaxtzu' twi' witz Syon! Chiju' b'itzal.</t>
